description: The band's credits have been updated. The guitar has been revised to fit more of Charlton's live performances. Additionally, the talk box has been updated to include more of the staccato approach that Dan McCafferty would implement during live performances and finally, Pete Agnew's bass line has been updated to fit more of Charlton's guitar lines in order to provide a thicker sound.
title: Hair Of The Dog

description: Some measures repeat many times. Made any measure that  repeats more than twice have the last measure be in an "outro" measure so you know when the change to the next riff is about to happen
title: Hair Of The Dog

description: The song is made up of 3 repeating riffs. Shortened the bass line of the song by using repeat bars instead of many repeated measures
title: Hair Of The Dog

description: More Tracks, better rhythm, better sound
title: Hair Of The Dog
